name: Tennis Go: World Tour 3D
description:
This sports game vividly display the real tennis court. No matter when and where, you can be immersed in the excitement and wonderfulness of the tennis.

The gameplay of this game is simple and intuitive, easy to learn but full of skill. According to different levels, there are different difficulty modes and detailed tutorials, so that you can learn tennis knowledge without any difficulties.

Improve your battle skills, unlock high-level tournaments, and enjoy your journey to play tennis anywhere and at any time.

Play against players all over the world. Train your players, collect and customize equipments to win exclusive glory.

Game features
● PVP single player, defeat your opponents with your skills and wisdom!
● Participate in the World Tour and receive rewards in the world leaderboard!
● Weekly league, defeat the strongest opponent and step forward toward the top!
● Perfect friend interaction system, become friends with like-minded players all over the world
● Lively and novel chat emoticons, you can express emotions at any time during the game
● Customize character costume characters according to your preferences

Download now, use your tennis talent, win the game to accumulate trophies, and collect various equipments!

Follow us, know more events in advance, and surprise benefits waiting for you to receive!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Tennis-Go-World-Tour-3D-108336930927670
